00039 #include "../types/Types.hpp"
00040 #include "../types/TemplateTypeInfo.hpp"
00041 #include <ostream>
00042 #include <istream>
00043 
00044 namespace RTT
00045 {
00046     namespace types
00047     {
00048 
00052         struct BoolTypeInfo: public TemplateTypeInfo<bool>
00053         {
00054             BoolTypeInfo() :
00055                 TemplateTypeInfo<bool> ("bool")
00056             {
00057             }
00058 
00059             virtual std::ostream& write(std::ostream& os, base::DataSourceBase::shared_ptr in) const
00060             {
00061 #ifdef OS_HAVE_STREAMS
00062                 internal::DataSource<bool>::shared_ptr d = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast< internal::DataSource<bool> >(in);
00063                 if (d)
00064                     return os << boolalpha << d->value();
00065 #endif
00066                 return os;
00067             }
00068 
00069             virtual std::istream& read(std::istream& os, base::DataSourceBase::shared_ptr out) const
00070             {
00071 #ifdef OS_HAVE_STREAMS
00072                 internal::AssignableDataSource<bool>::shared_ptr d = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast< internal::AssignableDataSource<bool> >(out);
00073                 if (d)
00074                 {
00075                     boolalpha(os);
00076                     os >> d->set();
00077                     d->updated(); // because use of set().
00078                 }
00079 #endif
00080                 return os;
00081             }
00082         };
00083 
00084     }
00085 }
